articles.summary: Insider Monkey: Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL) in Focus as Waymo Miles Grow, Citizens Reiterates Market Outperform. Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL) is one of AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On December 17, Citizens analyst Andrew Boone reiterated a “Market Outperform” rating on the stock with a $340.00 price target. The rating affirmation follows Waymo’s third-quarter operational update. The firm disclosed how Waymo, Alphabet’s autonomous driving subsidiary, reported its cumulative rider-only miles […] Related tickers mentioned: GOOG.

articles.title: Analysis-Global investors turn to Chinese AI as Wall Street fears bubble
articles.mainIdea: Analysis-Global investors turn to Chinese AI as Wall Street fears bubble
articles.summary: Reuters: Analysis-Global investors turn to Chinese AI as Wall Street fears bubble. Foreigners see China closing ‌the tech gap with the U.S. as Beijing steps up support for AI chipmakers, spurring bets on Chinese companies just as worries grow over lofty valuations on U.S.-listed AI stocks. U.K.-based asset manager Ruffer, for example, said it has "deliberately limited ‌exposure" to the Magnificent Seven - the U.S. tech giants - and is looking to add positions in Alibaba for a bigger exposure to China's AI theme. "While the U.S. remains the leader in frontier AI, China is rapidly narrowing the gap," said Gemma Cairns-Smith, Investment Specialist at Ruffer. Related tickers mentioned: 0981.HK, 5310.TWO, 688008.SS, 688256.SS, 688795.SS, AAPL, AMD, BABA, BIDU, GOOG, META, NVDA, OPAI.PVT, TCEHY, TSLA, ^IXIC.
